opis: Novosagrađena Kuća u Rugvici – Vaš Idealni Dom! U mirnom i pitomom okruženju Rugvice, nudimo vam novosagrađenu kuću koja pruža sve što vam je potrebno za ugodan i bezbrižan život. Udaljena samo 15 minuta vožnje od centra Zagreba, zahvaljujući brzom pristupu autoputu Rugvica, ova nekretnina je savršena za one koji žele miran život s brzom povezanosti s gradom. Glavne karakteristike kuće: Prostrano dvorište: Idealno za razne aktivnosti na otvorenom, opuštanje i druženje. Dva funkcionalna kuhinjska prostora: Savršeno za velike obitelji ili one koji vole ugostiti prijatelje i obitelj. Četiri udobne spavaće sobe: Prostrane i svijetle, pružaju dovoljno prostora za odmor i privatnost. Dvije moderne kupaonice: Opremeljene svim potrebnim sadržajima za maksimalnu udobnost. Četiri balkona i terasa: Za opuštanje uz jutarnju kavu ili uživanje u zalasku sunca. Lokacija: Blizina obrazovnih ustanova: Škola i vrtić nalaze se u krugu od 1,5 km, što ovu kuću čini idealnom za obitelji s djecom. Trgovine i crkva: Sve što vam je potrebno za svakodnevni život nalazi se u blizini. Javna prijevoz: Autobusna stanica udaljena je samo 50 metara, osiguravajući vam brzu i jednostavnu povezanost s ostatkom grada. Ova predivna kuća u Rugvici predstavlja savršen spoj mira i praktičnosti, omogućujući vam da živite bez stresa, a istovremeno budete blizu svih bitnih sadržaja. Ne propustite priliku da postanete vlasnik ove prekrasne nekretnine. Kontaktirajte nas za više informacija i dogovorite razgledavanje već danas! Za sve dodatne informacije molim da nam se obratite na: https://www.remax.hr/300261120-48 M +385 91 614 9597 T +385 1 2304 188 RE/MAX Commercial Hondlova 2/9 Zagreb Newly built house in Rugvica - Your Ideal Home! In the quiet and gentle surroundings of Rugvica, we offer you a newly built house that provides everything you need for a comfortable and carefree life. Only a 15-minute drive from the center of Zagreb, thanks to quick access to the Rugvica highway, this property is perfect for those who want a quiet life with quick connections to the city. Main characteristics of the house: Spacious yard: Ideal for various outdoor activities, relaxation and socializing. Two functional kitchen areas: Perfect for large families or those who like to host friends and family. Four comfortable bedrooms: Spacious and bright, they provide enough space for rest and privacy. Two modern bathrooms: Equipped with all necessary amenities for maximum comfort. Four balconies and terraces: For relaxing with your morning coffee or enjoying the sunset. Location: Proximity to educational institutions: A school and a kindergarten are located within 1.5 km, which makes this house ideal for families with children. Shops and church: Everything you need for everyday life is nearby. Public transport: The bus stop is only 50 meters away, ensuring you a quick and easy connection to the rest of the city. This beautiful house in Rugvica represents the perfect combination of peace and practicality, allowing you to live stress-free and at the same time be close to all essential amenities. Do not miss the opportunity to become the owner of this beautiful property. Contact us for more information and arrange a viewing today!
